## TocParameters.indicator property

Whether to display an indicator on:hover of the `textContent` of the matching DOM element. Defaults to `#`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
indicator: string | boolean;
```

## Remarks

The behavior is similar to hovering on a heading in a github readme file. This option has no effect if `anchored` is set to `false`<!-- -->. Turn off any indicator behavior by setting `indicator` to `false`<!-- -->.

Because only one inline style tag is injected even when multiple `toc` action is used on the same page, you should set a consistent `indicator` for all `toc` invocation to avoid unexpected behavior.
